title: Garen is too Op

embed.description: Thanks for watching my video click the subscribe button if you would like to see more

body:
Hey guys I heard that Garen was boosted so I decided to play him for the first time. I ended up with 10 kills and 1 death please see this video and decide if he needs a nerf.

 https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=KOnlxn0kvsU

From Kaiyunman Your Pro~

replies.body: Those players are fucking idiots for engaging when they did and sticking around when you did. Really. It is easy to say "Champ X is OP" when people try and pull shit like that expecting it to work in their favour.

You are garen and beat a riven in lane to get fed, and that makes you OP?

You laned against a Varus top and think that makes you OP?

You can get fed on any champ and make them look OP, does that make them OP?

I agree 100%, Low cooldowns, No mana cost, No need to go back, Garen with Teleport will never leave lane, If you dominate him in lane he will just do more damage to you and win lane, has a silence for someone who only wields a sword? Doesn't need to build damage to do damage, Only needs to build tank. True damage Ultimate and he is also super quick.
